Project Description
USDT.z is a demonstration and educational BEP20 token created to showcase advanced smart contract architecture on BNB Smart Chain.
The project demonstrates:
ERC1967 transparent proxy upgradeability
Versioned implementations (V1‚ÄìV8)
Controlled pause mechanisms
Interaction with decentralized liquidity pools (1:1 reference pool on PancakeSwap)
Important: USDT.z is not an official stablecoin, is not affiliated with Tether, and is intended solely for technical demonstration and testing purposes.
Use Case
USDT.z is used as a technical demo token to:
Test upgradeable proxy patterns
Demonstrate smart contract versioning
Showcase liquidity pool behavior
Educate developers and users on proxy-based token design
It is not a financial product and not marketed for trading profits.
